attributes.action: Stop foreign aid and protect the UK First
attributes.additional_details:
We need to stop sending over £8bn in aid abroad each year and use it to help British communities. We still supply financial aid to India with one of the biggest space programmes in the world.

The aid we send abroad needs to go back in to British infrastructure. (Local government services, flood defence, roads, green fuels etc) we need to make Britain strong again.
